forum.content:
Hi nice to meet you.
My CHINESE name is Zhu Pei Xuam.
and my English name is Sirl.
Although my English is not good，but I still can communicate with foreigners.
I’m come from Taiwan, I’m seventeen years and l’m a stusent too.
I really really like to follow fashion.
So I can teach others people to wear the clothes.
Beacuse I really interesting about fashion.
By the way，l can modify pictures too.
If you interesting me please e-mail me or call me.
I’ll waiting for you.
forum.title: 應徵面試工作穿搭與英介
